ComicInfo.Series: Tarot: Witch of the Black Rose
ComicInfo.Summary:
Each year, many people donate their body parts to others after they are dead. But what if the ghosts of the dead change their minds and want them back? Skeleton Man and Crypt Chick must stop the ungrateful dead as the spirits try to retrieve their donated parts from the living!
